comments.author: Indigo Santana

comments.text:
0:42 - that is actually very easy to explain. Apparently, in those twenty 
years the prawns learned English, just like humans did learn the prawn 
language. However, the build of their "mouths" makes it for them 
anatomically impossible to pronounce human words. They know the language, 
but they cannot speak it themselves. But they still understand what a human 
says. Same thing with humans - they know the prawn language, but they 
cannot pronounce "words" in it. So it is very reasonable that they speak in 
their own languages and still understand each other.﻿

comments.author: max harasen

comments.text:
Despite what some people in this comment section claim this movie is not a 
parody of immigration. Its a piece of social commentary about the apartheid 
and a specific event in South African history known as the destruction of 
District 6 in which a thriving black African community was forced by the 
apartheid government to relocate so that the wealthy land could be taken 
over by white people. It caused such a controversy that the land was never 
resettled. The film itself however is a cliched, boring, unsubtle, ugly, 
poorly acted, poorly directed, pretentious piece of shit.﻿

comments.text:
I didn't read all comments but i see that most of people forgot about few 
things:
1. Most of resources that you can get on earth you can get in space 
starting from hydrogen ending in huge comets made from diamonds, silver, 
iron, gold... etc etc 
And because they have technology, they can just fly to this comet and take 
what they need.  
2. If they would be explorers like most of people think they could have 
ship prepared to long travel, with all backup systems you can get, and with 
lots of smaller vehicles/ships that would help you explore new planets, not 
only with one or two small ships...   
3. Most of technology, even medical are made because of wars. So its not 
like just because you have hi tech devices and ships you are ideal species 
that want to explore space. And its not like just because you have all that 
ships you dont need to get resources and fuel when you are in space.
4. So only reason why Aliens would travel through galaxy it would be to 
find new places to colonize and store resources and food. because dont 
foget that Alien or not every living creature need energy, stored as a food 
or any other type of "energy" that it can get to live.
And why colonize? Maybe because there is too many creatures in planet, 
problem with food, sickness, some natural disasters.
Maybe first plan after gaining hyper-space technology is to get resources, 
just like we doing now. Like latest Rosseta mission, its one of first step 
to get information about this.
But something goes wrong: war, natural disaster and we have loots of space 
ships that need to find new place to live, and because most of technology 
is made in times of war we have spaceships filed with weapons just to make 
sure you can get food and resources in first planet you encounter.

In this movie we have such situation, what you need to know more to get it? 
 ﻿

comments.author: Ryan Pedro

comments.text:
The people in this thread need to go back and watch that movie again. They 
could not go home, but not because of the humans. The humans didn't want 
them there. The control module for the big ship was damaged and fell off 
the ship to the ground, where the main alien character (Christopher 
Johnson) had hidden it underground. It took him 20 years to repair the 
damage and find fuel for that control module by refining some liquid that 
was used in their technology. That's what we see him doing early in 
the movie. He said that he finally had enough when the eviction from 
District 9 started. But the whole point was, he was going to use that to 
return home. We never learn exactly what went wrong, but the implication 
was that they ended up at Earth by accident. It said that the 
humans believe the aliens had a caste system and that all of the aliens on 
board were part of a worker or soldier caste. It was suggested by one human 
that all of the ruling caste might have been killed in an accident or by 
disease. We never learn the truth on this, but it's implied that their 
planet is definitely still there. The humans didn't realize that 
Christopher Johnson was part of a higher caste and smarter than the rest of 
the aliens. It even tries to show you that he's smarter than the rest with 
his interaction with his friend at the start.The aliens were not enslaved, 
they were oppressed. And that's really kind of why the story is in 
Johannesburg. The aliens showed up during the time of Apartheid, then we 
enter the story some 20 years later, Apartheid is over, and whites and 
blacks are BOTH oppressing and exploiting this other disadvantaged group of 
people. Get it?
comments.author: MP197742

comments.text:
The movie was a hot mess of confusion... of all the places they could have 
landed.. they pick a nation that just enslaves them?... the UN said 
nothing? China, Russia, the EU and the US not scrambling to save the aliens 
to get a grateful alien race to share technology?...
.
I have no illusions about the failings of humanity.. but picking a fight 
with super advanced aliens seems a stupid choice...
.
if they had landed in France.. or Canada... the US...  they would have been 
allowed to build a colony in exchange for their high tech..  because come 
on...  some alien beings with technology so advanced it looks like 
magic..... would any thinking rational being decide.... hey, let's really 
piss these guys off?... uh.. no...
.
even if people wanted to steal their technology rather than ask to share 
it.. the fear of potentially fatal consequences would restrain them...  I 
get it was a social warrior message film,.. but the premise was stupid.

comments.text:
+Zelly64 You need to rewatch the movie. Christopher says they can't go back 
because they don't have the fluid. The fluid was needed to restart the ship 
under his shack and return it to the mothership. There are numerous other 
times where Christopher references going home as well. After they get the 
fluid and he sees the MNU lab with dissected prawns he tells Wikus he needs 
to return home quickly so he can save his people from being medical 
experiments, and at the end when the ship is floating up to the mothership, 
Christopher's boy asks him if now they're going home, and Christopher says 
yes.
comments.author: BigMikeMcBastard

comments.text:
+Zelly64 but when he said that he meant that they were not going home 
because they could not go to the ship, he was admitting defeat.

it was not that they could not get home, but they could not get to the ship.

comments.author: barnouk ELECTRO

comments.text:
Holy shit! I had to click earlier replies like a million times to get to 
the first response to "Now I've Forgotten Her Name". Going back to the 
comments section about District9, I see it as an allegory to the South 
Africa Apartheid. And a cautionary tale about power, greed, prejudice, 
exploitation, apathy, fear and other negative traits of the entire human 
race. These traits have proven to be destructive to this world on many 
levels. Rather than giving in to our negative traits, why not practice our 
positive traits instead; generosity, understanding, love, appreciation, 
cooperation, critical thinking, and valuing life.﻿

we have weapons that we've built for only a couple hundred years, that 
somehow that can go against weapons from aliens whove been doing their 
stuff for thousands of years.

Your argument is also very retarded, considering that you think our low 
knowledge of physics actually mean something to aliens whove been @ it for 
far longer.
comments.author: Jaffer Norms

comments.text:
+lonercs I said 'rage', which you are. You're literally showing everybody 
how unintelligent you are. Do not speak for science, please! Science is an 
ever-changing set of laws that helps us to forge understanding. It is not 
eternally correct nor can it ever be since the universe is constantly 
unfolding. Your logic is also unbelievably bad. If we can make those nukes, 
right? What makes you think they haven't come up with much bigger nukes?

Don't call people idiots when you are clearly the biggest one here.
comments.author: Omni Spawna (Xinika)

comments.text:
+lonercs "Where are you getting this information from if not your ass? Do 
you have any proof of this? Also, again, hyperspace technology will not 
protect you from a nuclear bomb."

Beamships require shields to actually venture out into space. (Space isn't 
'clear', it's more like a turbulent sea) It's logical to assume their 
technology is based on control and dismantlement. A nuke can be deterred or 
even disabled before it reaches its target. 

Also proof is individual. You're asking me to make up the determination of 
your mind? Are you so devoid of simple logic?

"Your entire argument relies on your retarded sense of pseudo-science, 
which I can write off as bullshit since you provided nothing to back any of 
it up. The human race is not defenseless, the humans in this film as access 
to the alien weaponry, the alien mechs can be taken down with human 
technology (the anti-tank missile), and no amount of technology will stop a 
weapon from working. The best they can do is armor, which like the mech, 
can be overpowered by human technology."

You have watched far too much TV. My entire argument is not pseudo-science. 
My argument is pure logic and frankly wisdom, which you seemingly have none 
of beyond your hollywood thesis and outdated scientific models. Your retort 
has been nothing but rage which further proves my point of earthling 
arrogance.

"Also the Theory of Relativity is not "wrong." It was PROVED to be correct 
through experimental testing. It's also the cornerstone of modern physics 
which is proven to be correct. But since you are saying that the laws of 
fucking physics change based on location, I guess you're going to tell me 
all of modern physics is wrong too."

Stopped right here. The theory of relativity IS wrong. There are SEVERAL 
ways to break space and time. I can gladly put you in the right direction 
and better yet, we can mark this conversation right now so that in let's 
say... 10, maybe 20 or even 30 years I can return to say I'm right. Do some 
research.

"As for a personal note, you are a pseudo-intellectal loser and it's clear 
by the way you write. Your insults is clearly from someone that is both too 
full of themselves and is trying way too hard to sound smart. You don't 
make up anything you say with any argument or evidences, and your probably 
a fucking child."

This is a clear display of your own insecurities as I have thrown no 
insults beyond criticisms on your actions. 'Evidence' is self-made and 
self-created and you are asking me to perform your own duty as a human 
which naturally makes you appear to be extremely unevolved.

Also, it's you're*
comments.author: Jedaiah X

comments.text:

comments.text:
+Jedaiah X
Where are you getting this information from if not your ass? Do you have 
any proof of this? Also, again, hyperspace technology will not protect you 
from a nuclear bomb.

Your entire argument relies on your retarded sense of pseudo-science, which 
I can write off as bullshit since you provided nothing to back any of it 
up. The human race is not defenseless, the humans in this film as access to 
the alien weaponry, the alien mechs can be taken down with human technology 
(the anti-tank missile), and no amount of technology will stop a weapon 
from working. The best they can do is armor, which like the mech, can be 
overpowered by human technology.

As for that hyperspace tech, again, if there ship gets hit with a nuke, or 
if any missile at the right spot, the ship is going to go down.

Also the Theory of Relativity is not "wrong." It was PROVED to be correct 
through experimental testing. It's also the cornerstone of modern physics 
which is proven to be correct. But since you are saying that the laws of 
fucking physics change based on location, I guess you're going to tell me 
all of modern physics is wrong too.

As for a personal note, you are a pseudo-intellectal loser and it's clear 
by the way you write. Your insults is clearly from someone that is both too 
full of themselves and is trying way too hard to sound smart. You don't 
make up anything you say with any argument or evidences, and your probably 
a fucking child.

comments.author: F32FX23

comments.text:
+lonercs "Go be a pretentious idiot else where, you are no where near as 
smart a you think you are."

Uhh, you're the one thinking earth has a chance against creatures capable 
of hyperspace travel and you call me pretentious? Extremely ironic.

Also earthling laws of physics are universal? Who taught you that? An earth 
worm who hasn't even ventured out into space? Cute. Fyi, civilizations gain 
understanding based on what is available to them. It does not mean that our 
understanding is universally correct nor does it mean our understanding is 
universally stored as a law. So no, you are wrong and anyone thinking that 
OUR, NON-SPACE-FARING PHYSICS (actually no, scratch that - our 
NON-SPACE-FARING UNDERSTANDING) is the key to discovering the universe is 
also hilariously wrong, considering our world still contains the 
consciousness-evolutionary level of mideval times. Cavemen with cellphones, 
if you will.

Hate to bust your bubble, but we have a damn long way to go.

The universe is an interchangeable dynamic with laws that apply differently 
based on the period, location and designation. Any thought otherwise is 
unscientific, laughable and unintelligent at best.

Please, keep coming at me with your backward science that in a few years 
you will replace again and again and again, just like Einstein's theory of 
relatively is wrong.

Also reality? Really? Do you even know why we exist and what our purpose 
is? Do you really want to get into that conversation with me?
comments.author: Jedaiah X

comments.text:
+Jedaiah X
Also, you are a faggot
comments.author: lonercs

comments.text:
+Jedaiah X
Ok, you are either a troll or an idiot. One, your first sentence screams of 
pretentious stupidity. Two, the laws of physics ARE UNIVERSAL YOU RETARDED 
FUCK! They are literally the laws of the universe/reality. You can't break 
the laws of physics since doing so would be literally be impossible within 
the confines of reality. The laws of physics don't change based on 
cosmological position. If they did, we would not be able to use satellites 
or land anything on other planets, nor learn anything about the universe. 
The Mars Rover proves that you are wrong and stupid.

Go be a pretentious idiot else where, you are no where near as smart a you 
think you are.
comments.author: lonercs

comments.text:
+lonercs Hahahaha, this is so barbaric and unevolved it's funny. The mere 
fact that you think earthling laws of physics are actually universal. Oh 
man, what's even better is that you think more advanced races somehow would 
utilize our primitive understandings or calculations concerning tactics or 
weaponry? My goodness, earth people are so dumb. They actually think more 
advanced races harbor their backward logic. Lol?

Reality is that we do not stand a snowball in hell of a chance against any 
real space faring race.

Lay off the bullshit hollywood or even our backward-arsed science teaches.

We haven't even been able to reach the edge of our solar system. Our 
scientists still haven't even found out the Universe has 7 belts and we 
reside only in belt 4 which is where physical matter resides (Gases, 
planets etc) We still haven't even begun to understand that the universe, 
and other universes are in a bubble of Absolute Absolutums. We still 
haven't even begun to understand finematter. We still haven't even figured 
out reincarnation beyond religious beliefs. We still have RELIGION on earth 
LOL. We haven't even perfected time travel. We do not fully grasp tachyon 
technology. We still haven't even discovered the seven fundamental forces.

WE CAN'T EVEN DEVELOP AN ARTIFICIAL SUN YET.
WE CAN'T EVEN MAKE SYNTHETIC CREATURES WITH ARTIFICIAL SPIRIT FORMS.
WE CAN'T EVEN DEVELOP SPACE-FARING BEAMSHIPS.
WE CAN'T EVEN COME TO PEACE WITH OUR OWN FUCKING PLANET.
MOST OUR PLANET DOESN'T EVEN KNOW THE MEANING OF LIFE AND THINKS ITS SOME 
CRAZY COMPLEX PHILOSOPHICAL QUERY.

Are you remotely close to being serious?

Eat a slice of humble pie you simple earth worm and fall in line. We're 
babies. Screaming, half-retarded inbred children at the ass-end of space 
who are bloody lucky we have a few people watching our back. However, there 
are other people out there in space who have been at it far longer than us 
and believe me, they got bigger guns buddy and they won't be afraid to use 
it. And yes, some of them are just waiting until we can leave our solar 
system to come say 'hi' in the wrongest possible way.

We go in space with that primitive, stupid, idiotic, prideful mentality 
some of you earth people display, then we will be easily destroyed.
comments.author: Jedaiah X

comments.text:
We have tactical fucking nuke and enough to blow up the planet like one 
hundred times. Just because they can space travel, that doesn't mean their 
ships can survive a direct assault from a thermonuclear warhead. Also, 
thermonuclear cluster missile. Those aliens are fucked! Also before you try 
to bring up "force fields," they would have to be turned off to use any 
weapons, also they have to be possible in the laws of physics which doesn't 
look good.

Also, when we take down one of their ships, we get access to their weaponry 
and technology, which ironically why if the aliens in District 9 came back 
to wage war, they would lose. The humans were already researching the 
weapons before the aliens left. Also only one part of the human race were 
bad to the aliens if memory serves correctly.

comments.text:
+acetraker1988 Very true however, if as a race, they were able to figure 
out how to transport themselves throughout time and space near 
instantaneously, the chances of them being dumb enough to lose to us is 
pretty low. Not even sure tactics would come in to play, they could most 
likely wipe us out at the push of a button. We might not even meet them, 
they could send robots beforehand to scout out places and destroy any 
threats that might be present before they arrive. If we're already trying 
to make automated aircraft with the technology we have now, I'm sure any 
kind of space-faring race would have done so too.

Seeing how retarded most people are in the YouTube comments though, I doubt 
they'd even consider us intelligent life. We're just a bunch of mammals who 
haven't even moved off of our little space-rock yet. On a cheerier note, 
Merry Christmas by the way!

comments.text:
The movie was a comment on the racism of Apartheid & how it is perpetuated 
against a different group of bewildered refugees who basically want to 
return home.
The authorities (MNU) are more interested in the alien armament technology. 
Unfortunately the weapons have a biological key, in the hands of a human 
they are inert.
Therefore Wikus is seen as a valuable comodity, rather than someone who 
desperately needs help. He is subject to experiments and physical abuses by 
MNU. Ironically he finds safety within District 9 with the aliens.﻿
